Class Players

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hoovler.dao.impl.DefaultPlayerDao
      • com.hoovler.dao.impl.Players
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hoovler.dao.generic.PlayerDao

    public class Players
extends com.hoovler.dao.impl.DefaultPlayerDao
    The DAO object model for Players within the name-game-api project.

    Extends DefaultPlayerDao, which implements PlayerDao

    Author:
    github.com/hoovler
